title: Nasdaq Dips Over 400 Points Amid Plunge In Tesla, Nvidia Shares: Greed Index Remains In 'Extreme Fear' Zone
text: The CNN Money Fear and Greed index showed some easing in overall fear level, while the index remained in the “Extreme Fear” zone on Monday.

title: Uber: Tesla Fears Overblown, Now Is The Perfect Time To Buy
text: Despite fears over AV competition, Uber's partnerships with major AV players and its unique technology platform create a strong competitive edge. Trump's tariffs benefit Uber by increasing car ownership costs, driving more consumers to ride-hailing services. Uber's current valuation and projected growth make it an attractive investment, with potential for significant stock price appreciation.

title: Market Indexes Tank Again, but Gold Continues to Shine
text: The COMEX closed today's session climbed +3.3% today to a current spot price of $3426 per ounce -- a new record high.

title: Options Action: Traders feeling bearish on Tesla
text: Mike Khouw, OpenInterest.Pro chief strategist, joins CNBC's Melissa Lee and the Options Action traders.

title: Mag 7 stocks fall, small businesses navigate tariffs
text: Asking for a Trend host Josh Lipton breaks down some of the market action on April 21, 2025. Solidarity Capital CEO Jeff McClean joins the show to discuss the Magnificent 7, as the stocks fell amid the market sell-off.

title: Tesla needs to find a new growth engine and soon, says fmr. Board Member Steve Westly
text: Steve Westly, The Westly Group founder & managing partner, former Tesla Board member, joins 'Closing Bell Overtime' talk the headlines weighing on Tesla's share price.

title: Markets tank on Trump comments about Powell, Nvidia & Tesla tumble
text: Market Domination anchors Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton break down the latest market news for April 21, 2025. Stocks fell sharply after President Trump continued to lash out against Fed Chair Powell.

title: Tesla settles wrongful death lawsuit claiming sudden acceleration in Ohio crash
text: Elon Musk's electric vehicle company Tesla has agreed to settle a wrongful death lawsuit filed by the estate of a man who was killed in 2021 after his Tesla crashed and caught fire near Dayton, Ohio.

title: Tesla shares tumble ahead of first-quarter earnings report
text: Tesla shares dropped almost 6% on Monday, a day ahead of the company's first-quarter earnings report. Investors are seeking answers about CEO Elon Musk's plans for the automaker, as he spends much of his time with the Trump administration, slashing the U.S. federal government.

title: Tesla Bull Wants Musk to Step Back From Doge
text: Bloomberg's David Welch explains why Tesla bull Dan Ives of Wedbush Securities is calling for Elon Musk to leave the US government and focus on the electric carmaker. David joins Caroline Hyde on “Bloomberg Technology.

title: Soloway: 30% to 50% SPX Pullback "Almost Inevitable," NDX & TSLA Bottom Potential
text: @verifiedinvesting's Gareth Soloway believes markets will rally on trade deal announcements. The issue comes down to timing, as Gareth doesn't expect tariff talks to settle for months, which will inch the U.S. economy toward recession.

title: Tesla Stocks Looks to Extend Losses Before Earnings
text: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) stock is down 7.1% to trade at $224.28 at last glance, one of the worst-performing Nasdaq Composite (IXIC) components today.

title: Tesla Stock Dives 7% Ahead Of Possible ‘Code Red' Earnings For Elon Musk's Firm
text: The latest instance of a stock market slide sparked by investor unease from the latest move by President Donald Trump is none other than Tesla, the electric vehicle company led by Elon Musk, the world's richest man and the self-described “first buddy” of Trump, as Wall Street braces for a crucial update from the car company.

title: TSLA Price "Still Attractive" Into Earnings, Robotaxi Roadmap in Focus
text: Brian Mulberry says the "most likely outcome" for Tesla's (TSLA) earnings will be a decline in vehicle unit sales. However, there is a profitable model he sees in the Mag 7 giant's energy business.

title: Tesla Is Sinking Again Today: Is It Time to Buy the Stock?
text: Tesla (TSLA -6.99%) stock fell again on Monday after news broke of a major delay in its production plans. As of 2 p.m.

title: 6 things to look out for in Tesla's big 'company update' tomorrow
text: Tesla's "company update" on Tuesday will offer insight into its performance amid a challenging year. Watchers will be listening for how Elon Musk backlash has affected Tesla and a potential DOGE end-date for the CEO.

title: Tesla Earnings Call Looms Amid Mounting Pressures: 3 Key Questions
text: As the market braces for Tesla's earnings report, the confluence of tariff pressures, political headwinds, and uncertainty surrounding the Robotaxi launch create a formidable challenge for the EV giant.

title: Why Shares of Tesla Are Falling Ahead of Elon Musk's Big Day
text: Shares of electric vehicle (EV) maker Tesla (TSLA -7.44%) were trading about 7% lower as of 1:03 p.m. ET Monday.

title: Hedge funds cut 'Mag Seven' to two-year low ahead of earnings
text: Global hedge funds last week dumped the so-called Magnificent Seven megacap stocks, bringing their exposure to the group to a two-year low just ahead of their earnings, according to a Morgan Stanley note to clients seen by Reuters.

title: Auto earnings this week: Here's what to watch for
text: CNBC's Phil LeBeau reports on what to expect from automobile earnings this week.

title: AMZN & TSLA: Mag 7 Options Trades Ahead of Earnings
text: Kevin Hincks kicks off the trading week with a pair of example options trades in two Mag 7 stocks: Amazon (AMZN) and Tesla (TSLA). For Elon Musk's electric vehicle company, he utilizes a call diagonal strategy with a bullish tone.

title: Tesla faces long-term damage unless Musk steps back from Trump administration, analysts say
text: Analysts at Wedbush have defended their bullish position on Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) despite its ongoing challenges ahead of the company's first quarter earnings report due after markets close on Tuesday. “As one of the biggest supporters of Tesla over the last decade we have been through many highs and lows on the Tesla story and each time with the back against the wall [CEO Elon] Musk was able to turn things around on the Tesla story,” they wrote in a note.

title: TSLA vs. BYDDY: Which of These EV Giants is Better Positioned Now?
text: Tesla TSLA has long been the poster child of the electric vehicle (EV) revolution. Since its IPO in 2010, this U.S.-based company has grown into a global icon, known for its sleek designs, bold innovation and a loyal fan following.

title: Tariffs Driving TSLA Outlook: Earnings, Margins & Model Y
text: Lower year-over-year profits is something @morningstar's Seth Goldstein expects to see in Tesla's (TSLA) earnings after Tuesday's closing bell. Tariffs can lead to higher unit production costs and pinch margins.

title: Top Stock Movers Now: Tesla, Nvidia, Salesforce, and More
text: U.S. equities sank at midday after President Donald Trump again blasted Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's leadership of the central bank, and there was little news about potential easing of U.S. tariffs. The Dow Jones Industrial Average, S&P 500, and Nasdaq all fell at least 2.7%.

title: S&P 500 and Nasdaq Index: Trump Slams Powell as Tesla, Nvidia, and Amazon Lead Stock Selloff
text: Trump's attack on Powell triggers a tech-led selloff; Tesla, Nvidia, and Amazon tumble as S&P 500 and Nasdaq drop sharply.

title: China's latest export controls on rare earth elements causing chaos in car supply chain: report
text: China's move to impose strict export controls on rare earth elements used in car production has reportedly sparked fears of potential shortages.

title: Tesla earnings preview, 'Sell America' trade, antitrust & Big Tech
text: Morning Brief hosts Madison Mills and Brad Smith take a look at some of the top stories on April 21, 2025. CFRA analyst Garrett Nelson joins the show to discuss what investors should watch from Tesla's upcoming Q1 earnings results.

title: TSLA Trends Lower Ahead of Earnings & TSLA Example Options Trades
text: Ed Butowsky says to focus on six-to-nine-month trends for stocks, believing Tesla's (TSLA) current chart shows a downtrend. He thinks that Tesla also has an array of issues against them, including competition from other EV makers.

title: Tesla Delays Launch of Cheaper, Stripped-Down Version of Model Y in US
text: TSLA delays the launch of its much-awaited affordable vehicle, which is a stripped-down version of its popular Model Y SUV, in the United States.

title: Tesla earnings: The ‘key things' to watch
text: Tesla (TSLA) stock is slipping Monday morning, just before the company is set to report its first quarter earnings on Tuesday. CFRA analyst Garrett Nelson joins Morning Brief to discuss the top things Tesla investors are keeping an eye on: sales guidance indicating an auto sales rebound and more information on the company's planned full self-driving roll-out in June.

title: S&P 500 Forecast: Apple, Tesla Drop as Fed Risk and Trade Fears Shake US Indices
text: S&P 500 slumps as tariff fears and Fed concerns hit US stocks. Apple and Tesla underperform, while tech sector drives broader market weakness.

title: Tesla Faces ‘Code Red' Territory
text: Several investors worry that Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) CEO Elon Musk is spending too much time on a Trump administration project called DOGE, or Department of Government Efficiency, which was created to take hundreds of billions of dollars out of the federal budget.

title: Live Market Update: S&P 500 Opens Lower on Political Rumblings in Washington
text: S&P 500 opens lower on Monday after a holiday weekend in which President Trump threatened to fire the head of the Federal Reserve.

title: NFLX "Great Reminder" of Emerging Winners, TSLA Delays More Affordable Car
text: Netflix (NFLX) popped after hours Thursday when it beat on earnings. Jenny Horne says the company's report proves companies can still win in a tariff-driven environment.

title: U.S. Dollar "Not Historically Low;" TSLA, GOOGL, BA Earnings on Deck
text: Kevin Hincks reports from the @CboeGlobalMarkets shortly before the opening bell after a long weekend. He believes "earnings and headlines are going to take over this market" until there's more news on trade deals.

title: The biggest questions facing Big Tech ahead of earnings
text: Tesla kicks off tech earnings season on Tuesday, followed by Alphabet on Thursday. All of the megacap companies have significant exposure to President Trump's sweeping tariffs, which will be a major topic on earnings calls.

title: Tesla Stock: Today's Top Price Target Set To $242.49
text: Good Morning Traders! In today's Market Clubhouse Morning Memo, we will discuss SPY, QQQ, AAPL, MSFT, NVDA, GOOGL, META, and TSLA.

title: Tesla reportedly delays launch of new low-cost model by months
text: Tesla is pushing back the promised launch of a more affordable EV by months, according to a report from Reuters. The new model, which is supposedly a very stripped-down Model Y, was supposed to debut in the first half of this year but now might not come until late 2025 or early 2026, states the report.

title: Tesla Q1 Test Drive: Will Earnings Steer The Stock Out Of The Ditch?
text: Tesla Inc TSLA will report its first-quarter earnings on Tuesday after market hours.

title: Tesla, Nvidia, Apple And Other Big Stocks Moving Lower In Monday's Pre-Market Session
text: U.S. stock futures were lower this morning, with the Nasdaq futures falling around 1% on Monday.

title: Tesla's affordable EV, robotaxis in focus after Musk backlash, competition hurt demand
text: Tesla investors will be eager to ask CEO Elon Musk two pressing questions when the electric vehicle maker reports results on Tuesday: when will the affordable vehicle launch, and is the robotaxi plan on schedule?

title: Tesla faces 'code red' if Musk stays at DOGE, analyst warns
text: Ahead of a crucial earnings report, Elon Musk is under pressure to choose between Tesla and DOGE. Wedbush analyst Dan Ives warned Tesla faces a "code red" if Musk doesn't step back from his government role.

title: Tesla Stock Is Falling. Why an Odometer Lawsuit Won't Move Shares.
text: Tesla is set to report first-quarter earnings on Tuesday. Wall Street is looking for earnings per share of 39 cents, according to FactSet, down from 45 cents a year ago.

title: Should You Buy Tesla While It's Below $250?
text: No one will argue with the simple fact that Tesla (TSLA -0.13%) has been a spectacular investment. In the past five- and 10-year periods, its shares have accelerated 396% and 1,640% higher, respectively (as of April 15).

title: Tesla Stock Has Crashed 50% and Investors Just Got Bad News From One of Wall Street's Biggest Bulls
text: Tesla (TSLA -0.13%) stock peaked at $480 per share in December. At the time, Donald Trump had just won the presidential election with tremendous financial support from CEO Elon Musk, and investors were confident the company would benefit from their relationship.

title: Tesla earnings could offer hope for the stock. But this has to happen first.
text: There's one thing both Tesla Inc. bulls and bears might agree on: The EV maker's near-term prospects are murky, and this week's earnings report might to offer some direction for the stock.
